name: The Patchwork Girl of Oz
summary: A Munchkin boy named Ojo must find a cure to free his Uncle Nunkie from a magical spell that has turned him into a statue. With the help of Scraps, an anthropomorphic patchwork doll, Ojo journeys through Oz to save his uncle.
info:
• 中文名: 奥兹国的拼布偶女孩
  • 作者: Lyman Frank Baum
  • 别名: オズのつぎはぎ娘
  • 别名: 碎布姑娘
  • 别名: 奥兹国之拼布女孩与不幸男孩
  • 出版社: Reilly & Britton
  • 发售日: 1913年
  • 插画: John R. Neill
